actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Interior Department, OMB.

official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of the Interior, under certain conditions, to convey the Wrightsville Beach Test Facility (a Federal desalting facility) to the town of Wrightsville Beach, North Carolina, and to convey the Roswell Test Facility (another Federal desalting facility) to the city of Roswell, New Mexico, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of the Interior to convey, without consideration, all Federal right, title and interest in specified desalting test facilities to: (1) the town of Wrightsville Beach, North Carolina; and (2) the town of Roswell, New Mexico. Conditions such conveyances upon specified circumstances. States that title reverts to the United States if the property should cease to be used for public purposes.

titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of the Interior, under certain conditions, to convey the Wrightsville Beach Test Facility (a Federal desalting facility) to the town of Wrightsville Beach, North Carolina, and to convey the Roswell Test Facility (another Federal desalting facility) to the city of Roswell, New Mexico, and for other purposes.
